website_summaries.verdict: A high-end comforter that has received some criticism regarding the authenticity its composition.
pros: High thread count and fill rating
cons: Dimensions are slightly smaller than some other products

customer_reviews.title: It's not hypoallergenic
customer_reviews.text: Quality wise it's good but it's definitely not hypoallergenic which is the main reason why I purchased it. It sheds like no tomorrow if that's a concern for you then definitely don't purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Unis313

customer_reviews.title: Great in every way except one (filling leaking)
customer_reviews.text: It has started to leak feathers now after using it for 4 years which I do not mind which is why I did not take any starts off for that reason. I am on year 5 now. I have never washed it as I keep it covered. It feels great and very warm at night with heating set at 66 F. Whenever guests,even ones form warmer climates, have used this they have also said that the comforter was very comfortable and warm.
customer_reviews.author: mavern

customer_reviews.title: Quality comforter that doesn't lose it's loft or doesn't shift its down!!
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is the best comforter I have ever purchased. The last one I bought from another supplier ended up with all the down shifting to the edges of the cover thus only leaving the two sheets of material....got cold every time I used it. And the one I bought before that one did the same thing. This comforter's down has not shifted as of yet and I have had it on my bed for over a month now. It is absolutely wonderful....like sleeping in a cloud as another reviewer stated. Buy it....you'll love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cerebrl

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: This is easily the best comforter I have ever used, the last goose feather comforter I used had a hard time holding in the feathers regardless of how you wash it, this one seems to do a good job keeping all the feathers under control after the proper wash. It also fits perfectly and stays in place in my duvet.
customer_reviews.author: iJKJames

customer_reviews.title: Great Thickness for Picky Sleeper
customer_reviews.text: This is a great comforter that is comfortable and has good temperature regulation. I was initially a little disappointed by the thickness of this blanket (it was thinner than I was expecting) when I first opened it, but it eventually fluffed up more and ultimately I am very happy with it. I do not think I would actually prefer one that is thicker than this. I think that the price point might be a bit steep still, but that is perhaps because I am used to prices paid out 8+ years ago on goose down blankets. (The prices seem this high everywhere for this quality).
customer_reviews.author: JJ 3 J

customer_reviews.title: Too Warm and Losing Feathers
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this year round comforter. I did lots of research and decided on this one based on reviews and description. There is no way I can use this year round (and I live in Minnesota and keep my house cool). It is very warm. Not necessarily a bad thing but I wanted something I could use year round. My other issue is the feathers. It is losing feathers like crazy. Most of the baffle boxes are nearly empty.Though the feather loss is annoying I am kind of hoping it will make it a little cooler to sleep under. Buy with caution. I don't regret the purchase but I'm not sure I'd order it again.
customer_reviews.author: E. B.

customer_reviews.title: Good for a month...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product on amazon in april and recieved it in may. For a 250$ Product its horrible. Just started using it in September and there are feathers EVERYWHERE in my room. This thing is covered with a duvet cover that is zippered and they still are everywhere in my room. At this rate this comforter will last me a month until it is unusable. Thought amazon would review there pricer products better but guess not....
customer_reviews.author: Zachary L

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Down Comforter
customer_reviews.text: I love the comforter weight, not too heavy, not too light....it has been a great year round comforter here in the Pacific NW. Have used it through a very cold and damp Spring, to 90 degree temps for a few days this Summer. No down or feather leakage AT ALL. (Was worried about this when I read some other reviews). I didn't do a review right away, wanted to really use it first....then forgot about reviewing it. After long term use, I say two thumbs up. Glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: ofd1234

customer_reviews.title: Like Sleeping In A Cloud
customer_reviews.text: I really love this blanket..the price is pretty steep but the quality is excellent.. If it doesn't say which specific type I got..the Medium Warmth Goose Down The woven thread along the edges is classy..the blanket itself is so warm I don't even want any others & the baffle design does an excellent job of keeping the down in place.. When I opened mine I didn't have any trouble with leaks..there was barely any mess..a little fluff but really hardly any.. A worthwhile investment for the serious sleeper interested in a blanket of impeccable quality :-)
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart!
customer_reviews.text: Two stars because it was nice until a hole appeared, then another and another and there are feathers everywhere! Ugh! What a poorly made product. Surprised Amazon is behind this one. I think other reviewers will find out in about a year this thing just starts falling apart. I got the "light warmth" and now it's barely any warmth due to all the feather lossage! I will be buying a higher end comforter next time.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Justine

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: If you spend twenty minutes fluffing it up it puffs up well, very luxurious, also very warm, I live in Alaska and keep the heat turned low. It was dusty when I got it and I washed and fluffed till the cows came home to get the dust out of it. I needed to get a thick duvet cover to keep it from dusting in my face. a small amount of down came out while dusting but no biggie. The down is fine and all in all a good comforter for the price. If I had to buy another it would be this one.
customer_reviews.author: gadgetjunkiTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for...
customer_reviews.text: Looked at Goose Down comforters from other high-end retailers and they were so expensive I decided to take a chance on Pinzon - very glad I did. High-quality, well made and fits nicely in a duvet - plus, it is really warm for those cold nights. I like how this comforter is made - the down stays in the compartments and it is easy to fold and store. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel H.

customer_reviews.title: Not very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I didnt find this comforter to be what I was expecting. Maybe that is my fault for imagining something more... goose down like. it felt very light (not medium as described) and no different from my old goose alternative comforter. It was so similar I returned it and just kept using what I have. Maybe I will splurge on a higher end comforter soon but it is hard to tell what one likes without feeling it.
customer_reviews.author: Danny McGinnis

customer_reviews.title: super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend. I got the medium weight Queen. It is larger than normal and a king size duvet cover fits perfectly. I stuck between medium weight and heavy. The medium is cushy and full-- cant imagine what the heavy weight looks like. For $100 bucks its an Excellent deal. I wished I got this earlier instead of the cheap Ikea cover I'd been using for a very long time (and around the same price). So comfortable. I love going to sleep!
customer_reviews.author: L. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent comforter for the money!
customer_reviews.text: We had to retire our much-loved custom quilt after 10 years, so found ourselves looking for it's replacement. Did some online comparison shopping (weights/fill/feathers/size) and this one won out based on the price. We're in CA, so we don't get sub-zero temps, but it does get chilly. The oversize was imperative (we argue over blankets on the king size bed). We were delighted by the size, and even more thrilled with the quality -- nice material, nice weight to it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Leonard Chevalier III

customer_reviews.title: Love my comforter
customer_reviews.text: I am so comfortable under this down comforter. I use it all year! The winters are not very cold here in Central Florida, but it keeps me warm. On very cold nights I put a blanket over it to keep in the warmth. But, it is cool enough to use with the air cond. in the summer. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RPowell

customer_reviews.title: Leaks :(
customer_reviews.text: After doing lots, I mean LOTS, of research I decided to go with this comforter. It is great, and would be perfect, IF it did not leak down feathers. Now I have feathers everywhere!!! ...making my once heavenly experience now a nightmare :(
customer_reviews.author: Gerez

customer_reviews.title: Leader, do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this comforter if you want to wake up to be a bird every morning. It leaks insane amount of feathers, like insane.
customer_reviews.author: DaveTheWave

customer_reviews.title: Perfect year round for mild temperature areas.
customer_reviews.text: Love this comforter! I live in So. California (40 degrees pm winter low & 85 degrees pm summer high) and this thing is a perfect "not too hot, not too cold" comforter that is on the bed year round. The filling is very soft and fluffy and does not contain a single quill. It fits perfectly into my basic 10 year old Kenmore washing machine, which has no problem getting it thoroughly clean. totally recommend it if you don't live in a cold place.
customer_reviews.author: ALISHA MATRANGA

customer_reviews.title: Nice comforter, right price
customer_reviews.text: We just received this comforter and it seems like it was a good buy for the price. Its lofty (we got the med weight), quiet, and VERY warm. We have ours in a cover, so no problems with feathers poking through. Honestly, I have never owned a down comforter that didn't allow some feathers to poke through. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Comfy & cozy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice in the winter and summer months. Cozy comfy cover and easy clean. I recommend soft and fluffy blanket. My baby dog loves it too!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Tasha M. Bucalo

customer_reviews.title: Deliciously comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This was so comfortable! You couldn't imagine. It's great for cold nights, but I don't recommend it for hot ones. I had no issues with the down becoming bunched up and it was always cool to the touch to get in to, and retained heat to keep you warm.
customer_reviews.author: Floyd H

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious Fluff
customer_reviews.text: For a Medium Warmth, this comforter has great loft, but is not at all heavy. Its edges have a little 3/8" gusset all around. We have only had it for a week, but no sign of leakage, as reported by some. It is so nice to have that degree of luxury in our bed, which should be, always, as luxurious as possible!
customer_reviews.author: Sabeth Ireland

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy
customer_reviews.text: Great for very cold nights. Not good for spring or fall, too heavy, I end up sweating a lot
customer_reviews.author: GD

customer_reviews.title: FEATHERS EVERYWHERE
customer_reviews.text: Really, FEATHERS EVERYWHERE.. I could raise chickens in my bedroom, and it would look exactly the same. Keep looking for something better. I also bought one for my girlfriend as well. Complete disaster. Horrible product!
customer_reviews.author: Gildo Martins Grisolia

customer_reviews.title: just not the quality i hoped for
customer_reviews.text: this product was not as good quality as i hoped. i have had difficulty with very similar product. while it is plenty warm, overtime the feathers have migrated from one panel to the other because the stitiching was not sturdy enough, and also over time, the smallest feathers are coming out of the fabric. i did not want to repeat this same quality problem which seemed likely to arise after a couple of washings. i want a comforter that will keep its integrity with washings...
customer_reviews.author: Jane B

customer_reviews.title: Great, if you have a duvet cover over it!
customer_reviews.text: We've had it for a month and a half, seems like it will be great for Fall through Spring here in the southern California Valley, its starting to get a little warm on our march evenings but it is very comfortable, not too thick and with just the right "Fluff". Looks Great and Classy, but....TINY WHITE FEATHERS FLY EVERYWHERE, I inhaled one last week which drove me to order a duvet cover for it so hopefully that will keep our room from looking like a chicken coop. Other than that, and the fact that it does not fit in our front load washing machine, it is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Debating if this is the one?  Go for it!!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this so far. Perfect weight but would say on the heavier/warmer side over light. Great quality. I chose to pay a little more for the goose down because it's said to be better.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine N. Kaup

customer_reviews.title: Great for recent climate changes!!!
customer_reviews.text: I sent this great down comforter to my daughter in Seattle during a very chilly winter!! She loves it. . . . . . and since their cheapskate landlord won't fix their heater. . . . it's the best X-mas gift they received!!!
customer_reviews.author: yawnny

customer_reviews.title: light and warm
customer_reviews.text: when i first saw it i thought it was a little too thin, but now i don't care. it is perfectly light and warm, and the fabric is really nice. i've only had it for a week, but so far it hasn't leaked any down and the filling is where it's supposed to be. i'm glad i bought it!
customer_reviews.author: P. Villegas

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful ... but too warm
customer_reviews.text: Very luxurious and quality material. Our first down comforter, and we didn't realize how warm it would be in this southeastern climate (in winter). A little too warm. Had to send back. Thank you Amazon for the easy return policy!
customer_reviews.author: Chrispy

customer_reviews.title: WARM
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a fan of this comforter. Had my previous, expensive one from a big box store, one for 8 years. This one is a welcome replacement. This performs just as well if not better. Find myself sliding a leg out to cool down more often than with my previous one. I live in Iowa so this can definitely handle the cold winters. No issue with feathers coming out any more than what you would expect for a down comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M. Krogh

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Review for full/queen, medium-warmth comforter. I'm a little disappointed with the comforter for two reasons. 1. A full/queen comforter doesn't exactly fill up a queen-sized comforter. I would have ordered king but the over-sized would have been too big. My mistake for not searching for a queen-sized, I guess, but the reviews said it puffed up beautifully. Which brings me to reason 2. It's rather thin. My old comforter was fluffy and made the bed look soft and inviting. With the new comforter, it looks rather flat. I'm not sure why other reviewers have been pleased with loft, but I'm not. Yes, it's warm enough, but for appearances I'm giving it a 3-star review.
customer_reviews.author: NYC MacDougall

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with my duvet, it keeps me warm and cozy, ages well and I recommend it to anybody. I got it in an extra warmth, since I am the type who is aways cold, and I am not disappointed at all
customer_reviews.author: lika

customer_reviews.title: just great !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and some Flanel bed sheet at the same time and the combo just work great. the conforter is not too heavy but is warm. very nice inded. update, just got another one for our son.
customer_reviews.author: Loic

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, warm sleeping
customer_reviews.text: So warm and sumptuous. I had gotten one that seemed to have chicken feathers or something I'm allergic to but this one, with only 75% goose down, is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Joan S.

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend. Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Small feathers coming out. Do not recommend. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: I love my new comforter
customer_reviews.text: My new Pinzon Pyrenees Extra Warmth White Goose Down Comforter arrived in no time at all (shipped to Australia). I thought it looked a bit thin when it arrived but since having it on my bed it has bulked up nicely. And it is SO cosy and warm. I haven't experienced any loose feathers not even inside the bag it arrived in. You must expect a few escapees as even the best down jacket loses feathers from time to time. The only problem I have with it is that I don't want to get out of bed!
customer_reviews.author: Alfalfa

customer_reviews.title: feather leakage
customer_reviews.text: previous reviews are true. there is an incredible feather leakage. not the best quality. however, for such lower price, I guess that's all customer could get.
customer_reviews.author: Quan-Chau-Rose

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love how full and luxury this comforter is. It fits nicely in a duvet cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this comforter for over a year now; the medium warmth was perfect for the cold Canadian winter! Even after one year, the blanket is still fluffy. I have noticed some feathers poking out, but overall I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE: Sheds down
customer_reviews.text: Like many other reviews, this sheds down like crazy. It only gets worse over time. I've never had a comforter had a problem this bad.
customer_reviews.author: awefate

customer_reviews.title: Almost looking forward to winter
customer_reviews.text: I cautiously ordered this product but I haven't looked back once. It is just right for Ohio winters. It is fairly light weight, but keeps you toasty. Historically I have had trouble with blankets/comforters slipping down off the end of the bed, but this comforter stays in place. My quality of sleep is actually improved, as I am sleeping better than I have in years. It is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio Mom

customer_reviews.title: Feathers leak out
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this comforter. The feathers leaked out everywhere. It was the most annoying thing. You would think that it would have been better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: Not to warm ....very light weight and comfortable........... What more can I say? Its just what we wanted and the price was very fair
customer_reviews.author: Roger H. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Love my new comforter!
customer_reviews.text: Love this comforter after one night's sleep. Bought the Queen medium warmth. Believe this is perfect for year round use (we live in TN). Love that the length and width are longer than our last one which may have been for a Full/Queen mattress. There is no fighting for comforter. It did appear very thin in the package but puffed up after you opened it and put it on the bed. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: vtabor

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the weight and warmth of the comforter
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the weight and warmth of the comforter. No noticeable down loss so far and it'd been a month of daily use. Would recommend and buy again
customer_reviews.author: Adam Ming

customer_reviews.title: High quality, warm comforter
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I shopped around before choosing this comforter. The fabric is high quality and with a tight weave that really keeps the down contained -unlike poorer quality comforters that loose feathers. Plus, it is warm! I'll be just fine if the down compresses over time as it keeps me plenty warm with high loft - even months later.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Heaven
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable. Luxurious and a great price. Full/queen fit my F/Q duvet perfectly. You'll be thrilled if you buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Choosy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good Comforter, But
customer_reviews.text: It is a very warm comforter eventhough my room is cold, but some small piece of further came out from the comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Bi

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it!  It is so warm
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this comforter!! I read alot of reviews before I purchased this one and it is everything it says it is. It does take a while for it to fluff up but it does get there. It is warm and I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: tamdom

customer_reviews.title: nice and warm
customer_reviews.text: nice and warm comforter. i live in the cold northeast and this comforter is warm and comfortable. good price
customer_reviews.author: C. hatcher

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: If you run hot in bed, that is, in your body temp terms, then I'd recommend this medium warmth comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Just so you guys all know I have mine in a duvet and there are NO feathers or down flying around in the air or on the floor. We have had it 2 months now and are very pleased
customer_reviews.author: patty

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this comforter! We live in south florida so ordered the lightest one available. This comforter is perfect for us and would definitely recommend it for others looking for a comfortable comforter solution.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the comforter is very light, very warm , no odor , cover the body is very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Yan Hu

customer_reviews.title: Great Comforter
customer_reviews.text: This comforter has the same quality as my other 2 down comforters that I bought a Macy's for more than double the price. Don't be fooled by reports that the feathers leak. It is very very minimal. ALL down comforters leak feathers, no matter what quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Good product at good price
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Soft and warm. No feathers have come through.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great comforter !!!
customer_reviews.text: my first ever White Goose Down Comforter- and me and my hubby love it ! it is soooo warm and soooo light at the same time ! it is perfect for Chicago winter ! :) so happy with my choice ! Definitely will buy a lighter warm for summer from same collection !
customer_reviews.author: A. Nowak

customer_reviews.title: The Enthusiastic Reviews Are Accurate
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, fluffy, warm-but-not-too warm comforter. The lift is really impressive. We've had the comforter for about a month now, and no feather leaking at all so far.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Thorpe Blaha

customer_reviews.title: Best comforter ever
customer_reviews.text: We have owned many comforters before and they always somehow became very lumpy. The Pinzon really came through with flying colors. We bought the extra warmth since we live in a cold climate and not only do we snuggle up in but so does our beagle. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and warmth
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived within three days of ordering. For the money the quality is phenomenal. It is extremely warm -- may not be able to use it on warm summer nights. But I'd rather be too warm than too cold! I would recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen E. McPartlan

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. I got the medium warmth, Only problem i'm having is that the size is 90x98 and most duvet covers i can find are 90x90. So i currently dont have a cover.
customer_reviews.author: jt323

customer_reviews.title: it's very light and super warm but has a tendency to leak feather
customer_reviews.text: it's very light and super warm but has a tendency to leak feather though. But overall, I'm very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Chendan

customer_reviews.title: quality product
customer_reviews.text: The blanket is as it is promised, warm and light. Most importantly, it doesn't lose feathers as other down comfort we bought before.
customer_reviews.author: gw

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is the best down comforter i have ever owned. its not to heavy and is very comfortable. i highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: jason i

customer_reviews.title: I had to return this item, too warm
customer_reviews.text: Although this item was a 600 FP it was too warm. Returned this. It seem to be a quality product. I fluff it up before using it and there was no smell and it was very light and VERY warm.
customer_reviews.author: David F. Saenz

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It is warm and fluffy and feels so luxurious. Definitely a great piece!
customer_reviews.author: Antonia Peristeris

customer_reviews.title: This leaks like crazy. I have it in a Pinzon 400 ...
customer_reviews.text: Soft and warm, but that's it. This leaks like crazy. I have it in a Pinzon 400 TC duvet cover and it still leaks (A LOT). It makes my chocolate sheets and cover look terrible. It cost me 200 dollars and I'm considering throwing it away. That's how much it leaks...
customer_reviews.author: Amy Vo

customer_reviews.title: Not warm and it smells
customer_reviews.text: Just bought a king size and a queen size of these "Extra Warm" comforters. They are not warm at all. Worst than the 10 year old comforter that was washed multiple times. Also, it has the "chicken feather" smell. I don't think this is made with waterfowl down.
customer_reviews.author: Alf

customer_reviews.title: Not as fluffy as I expected, but nice
customer_reviews.text: When I unpacked this, I was underwhelmed. Compared to my other down comforter, which I've had for years, it is pretty flat. But once I put it on the bed, it looked fine and it is pretty warm. I will keep it, but probably wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Feathers everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this just didn't hold up very well. I bought this last year in the beginning it was fine. Feathers started just coming through the fabric and then I noticed an entire section was featherless eventually. I'm going to go for the down alternative next time. I just don't want to deal with all the feathers. Might as well not harm a few animals in the process. Side not yes it is very warm when it was staying together.
customer_reviews.author: Z Woodie

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was so hot I gave it away. No breath-ability.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Service is good, but
customer_reviews.text: I bought it and returned it already. Every thing is smooth and easy. I do not know how good this comfoter is, but I want a thicker and warmer one. Therefore I returned it and tried to buy a 50ounce filling one. After I bought other brand's 50 ounce, 750 filling one, it is even thiner than this one. So I am so regrate that I have returned this comforter.
customer_reviews.author: ccc

customer_reviews.title: Feathers Everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: What the hell is this? Just 2 Days after, A lot of feathers flew out and made my throat hurt. I won't buy any product of Pinzon never again.
customer_reviews.author: OSEONG CHOI

customer_reviews.title: Sleep Like the Deceased!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of googling to find the best product. It's great! All the down stays in place because of the unique pocket design. You cannot go wrong w/ this product.
customer_reviews.author: DSG

customer_reviews.title: 75% Goose Down, Let it be known
customer_reviews.text: I just received this comforter and the tag says "Minimum 75% Goose Down." I kinda wish this wasn't hidden from me. I bought the medium warmth comforter and it seems a lot thinner than I imagined. The 14 inch baffle boxes seem kinda big for the amount of filling in each one. You can feel fabric touching fabric if you feel the right places. I will update this review if I change my mind.
customer_reviews.author: RM Miller

customer_reviews.title: Leaks and Explodes Feathers
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Less than 6 months into owning this we removed it to wash it and as we did feathers were coming out of every seam. In particular, the corners were awful. My husband and I spent an hour picking the feathers out of the duvet cover.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Selbach

customer_reviews.title: Feathers escape - I hate that
customer_reviews.text: This would be a great comforter if it held the feathers in. I hate comforters that get feathers everywhere. I will proabably end up giving this to my dogs if I can't return it because I waited too long. So dissapointed. Ihate that people are so dirty and greedy that poor quality is even allowed to be sold :o(
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Down Comforter
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is quite heavy and and would not stay it is light at all. Also, it does not have quilting so that the feathers bunch up at the bottom of the comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Tonello

customer_reviews.title: Goose Down Comforter
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as our previous one from LL Bean
customer_reviews.author: King George

customer_reviews.title: Feathers EVERYWHERE - Don't make the mistake we made
customer_reviews.text: Had this comforter for over a year and regret our purchase. Wish we had spent the extra money to buy a higher quality comforter. We have feathers everywhere. All under the bed, on our clothes, its horrible. I just want to throw it away and buy the best one we can find. Regret this purchase. Don't make the same mistake we made. PLEASE BUY A DIFFERENT ONE!
customer_reviews.author: JJS

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best comforter I have ever owned. I hesitated because there it's not 100% down, but the reviews were so good, and I couldn't resist a machine washable down comforter. The reviews were right! No shifting in the down and washes up great! You would never know it isn't 100% down. No stray down flying around the room either or anywhere else either. One warning though, it is very warm! I am typically cold all the time, and I live in Minnesota, and I find myself throwing the covers off once in a while. With that said, I can set my thermostat to 62 degrees at night and have a great night sleep!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Chicago Winter's
customer_reviews.text: Bought for daughter. Lives in Chicago and the winter's can be harsh... but this kept her warm. She bought a duvet to help keep it clean. Loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: it's snowing in my bedroom...
customer_reviews.text: Please beware of leaking puffy down-balls... bought this back in Sept 2013. Started leaking one and a hlaf month later. I covered this with 2 covers but still leaks. This is the worst down duvet ever. Please do not waste your money on this. Most of the good revies are from recent purchases which probably not yet leaking... but it will be. Look at all the review from 3 stars and under. DO NOT PURCHASE THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Yoon Kwon

customer_reviews.title: Had it over a year and still sheds a lot!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this over a year now. I came here to tell everyone that over time this things sheds like crazy! It gets worse the longer you use it. I’m tired of cleaning my floors.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Lim

customer_reviews.title: If you don't want your house covered in down, avoid this like the plague
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is a great and lightweight way to stay warm at night. Unfortunately, that's really all I have good to say about it. After 3-4 months, it started expelling all of its down filling as rapidly as possible. Every time I remove the duvet cover, I have a room filled with down. I'm extremely dissatisfied, and if I could push for a refund, I would. Unfortunately the window passed on that option.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Schaper

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to purchase this comforter, because I would have to pay return shipping if I did not like. i purchased the heavy comforter (it was not very heavy) I would not want to see the others. It was flat not puffy at all feathers flying and looked like it was returned at least once of the tags was loose and very wrinkled, not sure if it was supposed to be wrinkled. I would not recommend. The box had a smile but I had a frown for the first time with amazon
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: The comforter is great
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is amazing. The first down comforter I have owned and it works great. A lot of loft and keeps you warm during the cold nights but does not cook you during the cold nights. Very soft fabric makes it more comfortable than most of the duvet covers I have bought for it. I have had no trouble with feathers coming out and I have had it for about 2 months. I cannot comment on durability past 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: J. Loomis

customer_reviews.title: perfect multi-season comforter
customer_reviews.text: I was in search of a mid-level heavy down comforter that would work well for all seasons. This one has satisfied that need with its soft, pillowy feel and yet remains somewhat light and airy. Machine washable is key as many comforters are dry clean only. Highly recommended for use Spring-Fall. Being not in winter where I am, I cannot comment on that season's use yet.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Storm

customer_reviews.title: 75% Down, 25% Feathers
customer_reviews.text: I'm a down comforter fanatic. Most are over priced. This one seemed reasonable given the statistics. However, the description isn't complete. The comforter is 75% down, 25% feathers. This is an important characteristic that wasn't properly disclosed. Also, says made in US from imported materials in the description. But the outer cover says made in china. So I guess its sown together in the US????? That being said, it is plenty work, light weight, and reasonably priced. I'd recommend, but can't give it more than 3 stars due to the misleading description. But we're happy with it thus far. No leakage yet. True baffling and a nice big size (we got the king).
customer_reviews.author: Online

customer_reviews.title: Light, warm, lovely.
customer_reviews.text: There is something about down, warm but not hot, nice and light. This is the least expensive one with pretty good reviews and they were deserved. Years ago I tried the major department stores, paid way more and yet ended up sending them all back. This one is a keeper. We have only had it about a month but have seen hardly any leakage at all, not feathers, not down, and not particles.
customer_reviews.author: Leo B

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable!t
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is so comfortable. When I received it I was skeptical because it didn't look very thick or that it would be warm enough for winter but it's perfect. I've never had a down comforter so I didn't realize how warm it would be. I will probably need another one for Spring/Summer because I've woken up a few times too warm and needed to take it off my legs. Very happy with the purchase though, it's warm, comfortable, and looks great. I got the duvet cover from pinzon for it.
customer_reviews.author: GeoVB

customer_reviews.title: light but warm
customer_reviews.text: When i first got this comforter it seemed quite flat. I put it in my duvet cover and slept under it for a few nights. It didn't seem all that warm so i took it out of the cover, fluffed it, and let it sit for the day. When i put it back in the cover it was fluffier and much warmer. It has been keeping me toasty ever since. I love the larger size too. It looks really good on my bed and fills my duvet covers much better than the last one i had.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy E. Kafer

customer_reviews.title: So Toasty
customer_reviews.text: I received this comforter four days ago, immediately put it on our bed, and LOVE it. It fits perfectly on our queen size bed, a very light weight, but so warm!!! I have not had it long enough to notice escaping feathers, but none so far. Very happy with my purchase! PS 1/27/12.....I still LOVE this comforter, and not a feather to be seen. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Fordyce

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Comforter
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this comforter last Wednesday and received today!. Great timing. It is not puffy but very even in distribution of the content. We put it in the duvet cover and it fits perfectly and then took a nap. After years of down comforter that the contents shifted to make one end puffy and the rest flat and not warm, this is just wonderful. I could have slept thru the rest of the day. This is just great.
customer_reviews.author: jachpf

customer_reviews.title: Fluffy Goodness...
customer_reviews.text: So this is our first goose down comforter. I researched many brands, types, etc. prior to purchase. Mt wide and I are very pleased with this item! It looks great, provides warmth and is light enough to not cook you in your sleep. The satin pinstripe is a nice elegant touch. I highly recommend thus to anyone still on the fence. Price is right ansa so is the product!
customer_reviews.author: "BIG MARCUS"

customer_reviews.title: Feathers leaks!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great blanquet, no more sweating at night. but feathers are going EVERYWHERE. it's very bad, especially if you have black sheets. I have it for a month and this is getting worse. I wonder why they do that... I ordered the medium first and it was way too warm (my room is not cold but not hot either), I exchanged it for the light and its perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Rafi

customer_reviews.title: Delightful!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy. I bought the queen size and it fits my queen bed well. I have had it over a month now and have not noticed it leaking feathers. When it arrived I laid it out on my bed and it puffed up beautifully within a couple of days. It is thick and cloud-like! Best of all, it is extremely warm. I live in a poorly insulated cement block house in Michigan, and even though it is the dead of winter I found myself waking up hot. So I turned down my heat. What a great money saver! I am very pleased with this comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Wren

customer_reviews.title: Thanks to all 137 of you who gave this comforter 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.text: We chose this Down Comforter because of the glowing reviews it received. We were not disappointed...it is light as a feather, so to speak, and as warm as we needed it to be.and very soft to the touch. It lived up to all the great reviews - we are not sure what the other buyers received - perhaps their standards are much higher than ours. It gets 5 Stars from our family.
customer_reviews.author: Charles J. Thomas

product_meta.title: Pinzon Hypoallergenic White Goose Down Comforter, 100% Cotton Cover - Medium Warmth, Full/Queen
feature_bullets: 100% Cotton Shell, 75% Goose Down/25% Down Fiber Fill
Made in the USA and Imported
White goose-down comforter provides medium warmth for year-round comfort
400-thread-count striped dobby weave; 40 ounces white goose-down filling; 600 fill power
PermaBaffle, a patented end-to-end 14-inch baffle box construction, keeps filling locked in place
Made in OEKO-TEX Standard 100 factory, an independent certification system that ensures textiles meet high safety and environmental standards.
